department: Natural Sciences and Engineering Research Council of Canada (NSERC)
short_summary: Supply and delivery of a Benchtop Ultrasonic Coating System (BUCS) for the National Research Council Canada (NRC)
description: The National Research Council Canada (NRC) is seeking the supply and delivery of one (1) Benchtop Ultrasonic Coating System (BUCS), for its Centre of Excellence in Energy (CEE).
full_summary:
# 23-58100 Benchtop Ultrasonic Spray Coating System

## General Information

The National Research Council Canada (NRC) invites proposals for a benchtop ultrasonic spray coating system. The successful bidder will provide a system that meets the requirements outlined in the attached technical specification document.

## Bidder Instructions

Bidder instructions and technical requirements are specified in the attached document entitled "Bidder Instructions." Bidders are required to submit two separate electronic technical and financial proposal attachments.

## Evaluation Criteria and Instructions

The evaluation will be based on the technical and financial proposals submitted. The minimum evaluation criteria include:

*  Mandatory technical specifications outlined in the technical specification document
*  Lowest evaluated price

## Tender Requirements

The NRC may request additional information from bidders to verify their qualifications. By submitting a bid, bidders agree to provide the necessary information to support their qualifications.

## Pricing Schedule

Bidder must provide the pricing schedule attached as Annex B to this RFP. The successful bidder will be paid according to the final agreed price in the contract.

## Delivery and Ongoing Support

The NRC will provide specialist support to assist with the delivery and ongoing support of the ultrasonic spray coating system.

## Services Required

The NRC requires the following services from the successful bidder:

*  Supply of a benchtop ultrasonic spray coating system
*  Installation support
*  Technical support
*  Training
*  Quality assurance

## Schedule of Delivery

The successful bidder must deliver the system according to the delivery schedule outlined in the technical specification document.

## Evaluation Criteria

Bidder must meet all the Technical Evaluation Criteria, as outlined in Annex C. Evaluation criteria will involve a review of bidder documentation, as well as on-site evaluation of the equipment.
